Project.Brief history of your project and organi: The National Library of Medicine (NLM) is a part of the National Institutes of Health in the United States. It is the world's largest biomedical library and provides access to a wide range of medical resources and information. The NLM's website, https://www.nlm.nih.gov/, offers a variety of online resources including medical literature, databases, and research tools for healthcare professionals, researchers, and the general public.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: The data available on NLM mainly includes medical literature, biomedical databases, genomic data, medical imaging, and other information. We hope that the data stored on Filecoin includes medical literature and research materials, biomedical databases, and genomic data. These data are of great significance to medical research and practice, and by storing them on Filecoin, more secure, reliable, and decentralized data storage and sharing can be achieved.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We have developed our own website data download tool and collected it. And send data to SP according to their needs, including sending hard drives, network transmission.
